function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid technological innovation in response to COVID-19","Impact":"Potential lack of understanding of new technologies and their implications for disease propagation","Mitigation":"Education and awareness programs to increase understanding of new technologies and their impact on disease propagation","Technologies":"AI and IoT for contact tracing, disinfection robots, and smart building systems","People":"General public, especially digital illiterate or 'luddites'","Owner":"Government and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Surveillance and monitoring by corporations and governance entities","Impact":"Potential invasion of privacy and exploitation of personal data for disease monitoring","Mitigation":"Regulations and policies to limit the scope of surveillance and protect privacy rights","Technologies":"Blockchain for secure data storage, encryption technologies, and privacy-preserving AI algorithms","People":"General public","Owner":"Government and privacy advocacy groups"},{"Description":"Global cooperation and governance challenges in the face of corporate influence","Impact":"Lack of coordinated response to disease propagation and containment due to corporate influence","Mitigation":"International treaties and agreements to regulate corporate influence on public health policies","Technologies":"Digital platforms for global collaboration, data sharing, and communication","People":"Government officials, public health organizations","Owner":"International organizations and diplomatic entities"}]}
